headline: U.S. Says China Is No Longer a Currency Manipulator
abstract: The Treasury Department’s removal of the designation provided a major concession to China just days before it is set to sign a trade deal with the United States.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — The Trump administration formally removed China’s designation as a currency manipulator on Monday, offering a major concession to the Chinese government as senior officials arrived in Washington to sign a trade agreement with President Trump.
